name: Fallen London - Affair ot Box - Conscience of Emp
description:
Full name: Fallen London - A Survivor of the Affair of the Box Run - The Conscience of Empire

This style gives the 'correct' buttons for the Conscience of Empire an orange highlight and removes the Guardian of the Realm buttons so they can't be clicked by mistake.

This style works with the June 2018 redesign.
css:
@-moz-document domain("fallenlondon.com") {
div[data-branch-id="23988"] .button--primary, /* An Agent of the Masters */
div[data-branch-id="11123"] .button--primary, /* Expose him to the newspapers */
div[data-branch-id="23983"] .button--primary, /* The Unionist */
div[data-branch-id="11121"] .button--primary, /* Help her escape */
div[data-branch-id="23998"] .button--primary, /* Doing the Rounds */
div[data-branch-id="11128"] .button--primary, /* Lie to them */
div[data-branch-id="23993"] .button--primary, /* The Course of Love */
div[data-branch-id="11125"] .button--primary, /* Keep its agents at bay */
div[data-branch-id="24008"] .button--primary, /* Encryption of a Sort */
div[data-branch-id="11131"] .button--primary, /* Intercept the messages */
div[data-branch-id="24013"] .button--primary, /* A Strong Box */
div[data-branch-id="11133"] .button--primary, /* Tell your larcenous colleagues when the strong-box will be moved */
div[data-branch-id="23973"] .button--primary, /* The Rewards of Intrigue */
div[data-branch-id="11142"] .button--primary /* Send your report to certain bandaged gentlemen */
{
 background:#db8e00 !important;
}

div[data-branch-id="11122"] .button--primary, /* Join the hunt */
div[data-branch-id="11124"] .button--primary, /* Help cover up the sordid business */
div[data-branch-id="11126"] .button--primary, /* Help keep them together */
div[data-branch-id="11127"] .button--primary, /* Tell them the truth */
div[data-branch-id="11132"] .button--primary, /* See that the messages arrive safely */
div[data-branch-id="11134"] .button--primary /* Tell the gentlemen in blue about any plans for robbery you hear about */
{
 display:none !important;
}
}
